main event: A bright light was observed over water for approximately 12 minutes, changing colors from white to yellow to green.
interesting points: The object hovered a few thousand feet above the water and exhibited a sinusoidal movement pattern,The light was not identified as a star, planet, or conventional aircraft,The sighting raised questions about the nature of unidentified flying objects,The duration of the observation was exactly 12 minutes,The object accelerated and disappeared from view at the end of the sighting.
location: north of Wallops Island, Virginia, USA
